trans-unit.source: Instructs the Visual Studio Tools for Office runtime to add the specified data object to the data cache in the document.
trans-unit.target: 指示 Visual Studio Tools for Office 运行时将指定的数据对象添加到文档中的数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can only be used in a document-level customization for Word or Excel created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可在文档级自定义 Word 或 Excel 使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的。

trans-unit.source: To add an object to the data cache in a document, the object must have a public type that meets the requirements of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加到文档中的数据缓存的对象，该对象必须满足的要求的公共类型<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about adding objects to the data cache, see [Caching Data](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关将对象添加到数据缓存的详细信息，请参阅[缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/30386922-1e00-4602-9ebf-526b271a8b87).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/30386922-1e00-4602-9ebf-526b271a8b87)。

trans-unit.source: If you want to have greater control over the caching behavior of the data object, you can implement the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.ICachedType> interface in the type of the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要更好地控制数据对象的缓存行为，你可以实施<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.ICachedType>中的对象类型的接口。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.CachedAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.CachedAttribute" /> 类的新实例。
